10074.title: Chieftain Pump Shotgun
10074.description:
The first ever Rust workshop collaboration! Workshoppers Abracadaniel & Baka has made this gorgeous Chieftain frontier shotgun that will guarantee you the tribe leader role. 

Be awesome and vote yes + favorite if you like this skin, you have our thanks

[color=#FF9800]This is a skin for the [color=#ffdba5]Pump Shotgun[/color] item. You will be able to apply this skin when you craft the item in game.[/color]

[color=#5098ce]Breaks down into [color=#ffffff]1 x Metal[/color][/color]

1266271867.description: Named for a pre-apocalyptic icon of loss and sorrow, this salvaged pump shotgun stands ready to deliver more grief in the modern age.

1125256583.title: Roadhouse
1125256583.description: Discovered under the bar of a roadhouse dive, this shotgun has been repaired with pieces of metal and scrap wood from that very same building.  Will that be cash or CHARGE, sir?

685504846.description:

576569391.title: Plastic Pump Shotgun

A pump shotgun assembled with a mixture of tough plastic toy parts and precision machined real parts.

"Shop Smart. Shop..S-mart"
--Ash Williams
Army of Darkness

Part of the Dangerous Toys set.

See more at [url=http://www.xtab.me]xtab.me![/url]

1209588681.title: Anthem
1209588681.description: Patriotically painted the national colors of a pre-apocalypse country to promote a forgotten cause, this pump shotgun has survived down the years in good condition, give or take a few spare parts.

954539010.title: Nordic Pump Shotgun
954539010.description:
Here's a rustic pump shotgun made in the Nordic style to go with the rest of [url=http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=943400404] THE NORDIC COLLECTION [/url]!

Please vote, fave, and follow if you dig it!! :)

822006475.title: Serial Killer's Choice
822006475.description: Serial killer before the apocalyptic event, serial killer after... the weapon of a truly sinister mind, only thinking of his next victim, and keeping count of the ones from the past.

1213224431.title: PumpShoti-9027 by mikolasek
1213224431.description: The best shotgun in the game is : The Pump Shotgun! The crosshair lights up at night to make headshots easier. It's a real radioactive paint gun.
